title: Question:
author: Freeman66
content: For the past 6 days I've been in this platform I've seen many ideas and helping hands spirits circulating round this forum. I must admit the spirit of growth revolve in this group in so much. As a newbie, I've been left with a confusing situation many times, sometimes due to the Trading Terminologies, Abbreviations and so on. With the spirit of being a man in me I come up with these plea, that my brothers and sisters here should help me carry along with the trading system so as I can as well grow like you.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: There is no much term to learn about, just register on one exchange like Binance, Kucoin or any other ones with trading guide and start reading their trading guides. They have video tutorials too which can make learning about spot, future and other trading types easier. You will have to learn more about indicators from external articlesRead more on risk management, very important. Do not use the amount of money you can not afford to lose to trade. For start, use very low amount of money that is even less than the amount of money that you can afford to lose to trade.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Learn the basics first. The links below will give you a headstart about the basic terminologies/concept when it comes to trading.- https://github.com/SpiralDevelopment/Awesome-Crypto-TradingThere's also this subreddit that has the most comprehensive guide when it comes to day trading. Even though they use most of their strategies in stocks trading, they can still be useful in terms of crypto.- https://www.reddit.com/r/RealDayTrading

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: My question is that are you sure that trading terminologies is the main challenge that you have because I have not heard such complaint from traders. What I believe is that every field of life has its own terminologies and you need to study and understand the field before you get to know the terminologies there in that field. So by the time you are learning and studying the field, you also get to understand the terminologies naturally. Likewise in trading field, you won't be outside and try to understand everything that goes on in trading, if you start learning through demo practice then you can natural understand them but if you want to understand it without being a trader then you will have more time to understand it because you won't be meeting them often. Well some of those terms I think are bull, bear, rally etc. You can also learn more from this board.

You must gain experience in learning methods of analyzing markets and trading, and there are many resources on the Internet that will help you with that, such as books, websites, videos, etc. Also, you should focus on market terminology and trading terminology and tools and understand them well, and you should get acquainted with risk management orders, as they will help you identify places to enter and exit the market without falling into potential risks and avoid entering into losing deals and buying currencies that cause a lot of hype in the market, Trading cryptocurrency is an easily hard for many beginners, and it has many positives and negatives, so I advise you to avoid falling into the trap of the negative and invest in the positives to make a profit.

Many people have suggested this to you before my post, including the names of the exchanges. After that it is important to know all the terms of that exchange, because many times newbie traders have to suffer big problems due to not reading these terms. And the most important thing is this, learn as much as you can about the crypto market because if you fail to do market analysis then all your previous knowledge will be wasted. Market analysis is most important to be a successful trader.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Your poll and what you're saying are confusing. Your poll is about earning merit and your post is about trading. But as your post about trading is also in the right section, we all came from being a newbie. These terminologies are just needed to be known by you and understand what they mean. If you see something new and you're not familiar with it, be quick in searching the meaning of it on Google and read the description, just be like that every time you see an unfamiliar word or term about trading.

comments.author: kamvreto
comments.body: in order to focus on a trading system, it is necessary to keep trying to learn how to trade well and what there is to learn. You certainly have to learn it from basic lessons so you understand how trading works.In this forum, there are many answers to questions that you might ask later, as long as you are not too lazy to read and look for the right topic, then you can study well.Make sure you learn using minimal money or not too much money because you are just doing some trials or learning how trading works. Do not push too much money if you do not understand what you are doing. Everything needs a process, so you have to process to be able to master trading knowledge.
